main.title: Welcome to Agate!
main.subtitle: Agate allows you to manage your own account and, for those with administrator rights, other users accounts, groups and integrated applications.

logged.userMessage: You are logged in as user "{{username}}".
logged.adminMessage: You are logged in as user "{{username}}" with administrator rights.
logged.authenticated:
If you want to authenticate, you can try the default accounts:
- Admnistrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

main.question: If you have any question on JHipster:
main.like: If you like JHipster, don't forget to give us a star on

error.authentication: Authentication failed! Please check your credentials and try again.

messages.error: An error has occured! Settings could not be saved.

firstname.minlength: Your first name is required to be at least 1 character
firstname.maxlength: Your first name cannot be longer than 50 characters

lastname.minlength: Your last name is required to be at least 1 character
lastname.maxlength: Your last name cannot be longer than 50 characters

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 1 character
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters

error.global: An error has occured! The password could not be changed.
error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 5 characters
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirm password is required to be at least 5 character
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirm password cannot be longer than 50 characters

messages.error: An error has occured! The session could not be invalidated.
